author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Employees Provident Fund Organisation here will conduct a Nidhi Aapke Nikat to redress grievances of subscribers on March 10.

The programme will be held at the sub-regional office, Sree Jayalakshmi Plaza, Anna Salai, Swarnapuri in the city.

C. Amudha, Regional PF Commissioner-II will preside over the meeting.

While the grievances of individual subscribers will be heard between 10.30 a.m. and 1 p.m.; the employers can present their grievances between 3 and 4 p.m. and the exempted establishments between 4 and 5 p.m.

A press release of Ms. Amudha called upon the employee PF members, employers and trade unions to furnish in advance the details of the grievances if any along with PF account number, name of the establishment, mobile number and e-mail ID to the PRO on or before March 7.

Mail

They may send their grievances through e-mail:sro.salem@epfindia.gov.in, the release added.
title: Grievances redress meeting
